Key Match Events: David Brooks scored the first goal in the 3rd minute
Neco Williams scored the second goal in the 38th minute
Teemu Pukki scored for Finland in the 45th minute
Brennan Johnson scored the third goal in the 47th minute
Dan James scored the fourth goal in the 87th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Neco Williams said 'A great performance. We came into the night with a gameplan and it came off. It wasn’t planned or anything, it was just instinct. Happy to score for my country, it’s a special feeling.'
Lawrence Ostlere commented 'Wales go through to the Euro 2024 play-off finals, and they do so in style, playing some excellent football and scoring some lovely goals too.'
